title: ForgeMCP在反编译出错
author: 航空兔子
txt_content:
ForgeMCP在反编译的时候出错，错误提示如下:
Fixing MCP Workspace
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "install.py", line 76, in <module>
    decompile=options.decompile, gen_conf=False)
  File "install.py", line 17, in fml_main
    disable_assets=disable_assets)
  File "J:\MC-MOD-MCP\forge\fml\fml.py", line 1013, in decompile_minecraft
    pre_decompile(mcp_dir, fml_dir, disable_assets=disable_assets)
  File "J:\MC-MOD-MCP\forge\fml\fml.py", line 1061, in pre_decompile
    download_minecraft(mcp_dir, fml_dir)
  File "J:\MC-MOD-MCP\forge\fml\fml.py", line 1125, in download_minecraft
    failed = download_libraries(mcp_dir, version_json['libraries'], mc_info['nat
ives_dir']) or failed
  File "J:\MC-MOD-MCP\forge\fml\fml.py", line 1181, in download_libraries
    headers = get_headers(url)
  File "J:\MC-MOD-MCP\forge\fml\fml.py", line 173, in get_headers
    response = urllib2.urlopen(HeadRequest(url))
  File "urllib2.pyc", line 126, in urlopen
  File "urllib2.pyc", line 406, in open
  File "urllib2.pyc", line 519, in http_response
  File "urllib2.pyc", line 444, in error
  File "urllib2.pyc", line 378, in _call_chain
  File "urllib2.pyc", line 527, in http_error_default
urllib2.HTTPError: HTTP Error 403: Forbidden
请按任意键继续. . .

求帮助，我是按这个贴做的:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 011%26typeid%3D1011
它出现"Fixing MCP Workspace"的时候根本没时间合并mcp文件夹
我是win 8,forge9.11.1.953,官网上下的

replies.author: zero28
replies.txt_content: 下载失败而已。。多试几次就行了。。

replies.author: 航空兔子
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2013-12-11 12:46 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-204344-1-1.html
又出来这个了:
================ Forge ModLoader Setup Start ===================
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "install.py", line 76, in <module>
    decompile=options.decompile, gen_conf=False)
  File "install.py", line 12, in fml_main
    download_mcp(fml_dir, mcp_dir)
  File "J:\MC-MOD-MCP\forge\fml\fml.py", line 518, in download_mcp
    mc_info = read_mc_versions(fml_dir, version=version)
  File "J:\MC-MOD-MCP\forge\fml\fml.py", line 78, in read_mc_versions
    base_url = 'http://resources.download.minecraft.net' % version
TypeError: not all arguments converted during string formatting
请按任意键继续. . .

已经按照你说的那个贴子设置过了
